thread.title: Heat's Jimmy Butler (calf) to miss fourth consecutive game - ESPN
thread.title_full: Heat's Jimmy Butler (calf) to miss fourth consecutive game - ESPN

author: ESPN News Services
title: Heat's Jimmy Butler (calf) to miss fourth consecutive game - ESPN
text: [Miami Heat](/nba/team/_/name/mia/miami-heat) star forward [Jimmy Butler](http://www.espn.com/nba/player/_/id/6430/jimmy-butler) has been ruled out of Thursday's game against the host [Golden State Warriors](/nba/team/_/name/gs/golden-state-warriors) due to a calf injury. This will be Butler's fourth consecutive game sidelined by his injury. The Heat also announced guard [Kyle Lowry](http://www.espn.com/nba/player/_/id/3012/kyle-lowry) (soreness) and forward [Caleb Martin](http://www.espn.com/nba/player/_/id/3138160/caleb-martin) (ankle) will sit out Thursday's game in San Francisco, the first of a five-game road trip. Guard [Josh Richardson](http://www.espn.com/nba/player/_/id/2581190/josh-richardson) (back) remains doubtful for the contest. Butler, 34, averages 21.5 points and 5.2 rebounds to go along with a team-leading 4.6 assists in 23 games (all starts) this season. Lowry, 37, contributes 9.4 points, 4.1 assists and 3.7 rebounds in 28 games (all starts) in 2023-24. Martin, 28, averages 11.0 points, 5.1 rebounds and 2.3 assists in 20 games (10 starts) this season. Field Level Media contributed to this report.
